name: 賴名亮
objective: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.
schedule:
Week1　　　　Introduction
Week2　　　　Patent system
Week3　　　　Patent literature
Week4　　　　Patent classification system, example: IPC (International patent system)
Week5　　　　Patent search strategy 
Week6　　　　Using software or online database to do patent search
Week7　　　　Practice of patent search 1
Week8　　 　　Practice of patent search 2
Week9　　　　Midterm report
Week10　　 　　Keyword search: 1
Week11　　　　Keyword search:2
Week12　　　　Analysis of patent map information
Week13　　　　Making patent maps
Week14　　　　Case study: 1
Week15　　　　Case study: 2
Week16　　　　Case study: 3
Week17　　 　　Course review
Week18　　 　　Final report
scorePolicy:
Rating and score：
(1) attendance and discussions in class 40%
(2) midterm report 30%
(3) Final report 30%
materials:
Reference book:
Patent Searching Made Easy: How to do Patent Searches Online and in the Library. David Hitchcock.
